File.AllUsersWebPart:
<webParts>
					  <webPart xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v3">
					    <metaData>
                                              <type name="Microsoft.Office.Server.Search.WebControls.CoreResultsWebPart,Microsoft.Office.Server.Search,Version=12.0.0.0,Culture=neutral,PublicKeyToken=71e9bce111e9429c" />
					      <importErrorMessage>Cannot import this Web Part.</importErrorMessage>
					    </metaData>
					    <data>
					      <properties>
					          <property name="Xsl" type="string"><xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" >
<xsl:param name="ResultsBy" />
<xsl:param name="ViewByUrl" />
<xsl:param name="ViewByValue" />
<xsl:param name="IsNoKeyword" />
<xsl:param name="ShowActionLinks" />
<xsl:param name="AlertMeLink" />
<xsl:param name="AlertMeText" />
<xsl:param name="SrchRSSText" />
<xsl:param name="SrchRSSLink" />
<!-- When empty result set is returned from search -->
<xsl:template name="dvt_1.empty">
<div class="srch-sort-right">
<xsl:if test="$AlertMeLink and $ShowActionLinks">
<span class="srch-alertme" > <a href ="{$AlertMeLink}" id="CSR_AM1" title="{$AlertMeText}"><img style="vertical-align: middle;" src="/_layouts/images/bell.gif" border="0" alt=""/><xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes">&amp;nbsp;</xsl:text><xsl:value-of select="$AlertMeText" /></a>
</span>
</xsl:if>
<xsl:if test="$SrchRSSLink and $ShowActionLinks">
<xsl:if test="$AlertMeLink"> | </xsl:if>
<a type="application/rss+xml" href ="{$SrchRSSLink}" title="{$SrchRSSText}" id="SRCHRSSL"><img style="vertical-align: middle;" border="0" src="/_layouts/images/rss.gif" alt=""/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes">&amp;nbsp;</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="$SrchRSSText"/></a>
</xsl:if>
</div>
</xsl:template>
<!-- Main body template. Sets the Results view (Relevance or date) options -->
<xsl:template name="dvt_1.body">
<div>
<xsl:if test="$ShowActionLinks">
<div class="srch-sort-right">
<xsl:value-of select="$ResultsBy" />
<xsl:if test="$ViewByUrl"> | <a href ="{$ViewByUrl}" id="CSR_RV" title="{$ViewByValue}"><xsl:value-of select="$ViewByValue" /></a>
</xsl:if>
<xsl:if test="$AlertMeLink"> |
<span class="srch-alertme" > <a href ="{$AlertMeLink}" id="CSR_AM2" title="{$AlertMeText}"><img style="vertical-align: middle;" src="/_layouts/images/bell.gif" border="0" alt=""/><xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes">&amp;nbsp;</xsl:text><xsl:value-of select="$AlertMeText" /></a>
</span>
</xsl:if>
<xsl:if test="$SrchRSSLink">| <a type="application/rss+xml" href ="{$SrchRSSLink}" title="{$SrchRSSText}" id="SRCHRSSL"><img style="vertical-align: middle;" border="0" src="/_layouts/images/rss.gif" alt=""/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes">&amp;nbsp;</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="$SrchRSSText"/></a>
</xsl:if>
</div>
</xsl:if>
</div>
</xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="/">
<xsl:variable name="Rows" select="/All_Results/Result" />
<xsl:variable name="RowCount" select="count($Rows)" />
<xsl:variable name="IsEmpty" select="$RowCount = 0" />
<xsl:if test="$AlertMeLink"><input type="hidden" name="P_Query" /><input type="hidden" name="P_LastNotificationTime" />
</xsl:if>
<xsl:call-template name="dvt_1.body"/>
</xsl:template>
<!-- End of Stylesheet --></xsl:stylesheet></property>
					          <property name="Title" type="string">$Resources:spscore,SearchActionsWP_Title;</property>
					          <property name="Description" type="string">$Resources:spscore,SearchActionsWP_Desc;</property>
					          <property name="ChromeType">None</property>
					          <property name="AllowMinimize" type="bool">true</property>
					          <property name="AllowClose" type="bool">true</property> 
					          <property name="Hidden" type="bool">false</property>
					          <property name="ShowMessages" type="bool">false</property>
					          <property name="ShowSearchResults" type="bool">false</property>
					     </properties>
					    </data>
					  </webPart>
                                        </webParts>

<webParts> <webPart xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v3"> <metaData> <type name="Microsoft.Office.Server.Search.WebControls.HighConfidenceWebPart,Microsoft.Office.Server.Search,Version=12.0.0.0,Culture=neutral,PublicKeyToken=71e9bce111e9429c" /> <importErrorMessage>Cannot import this Web Part.</importErrorMessage> </metaData> <data> <properties> <property name="Title" type="string">$Resources:spscore,HighConfidenceWP_Title;</property> <property name="Description" type="string">$Resources:spscore,HighConfidenceWP_Desc;</property> <property name="ChromeType">None</property> <property name="AllowMinimize" type="bool">true</property> <property name="AllowClose" type="bool">true</property> <property name="Hidden" type="bool">false</property> <property name="PartOrder" type="int">1</property> <property name="DisplayTerm" type="bool">false</property> <property name="DisplayImage" type="bool">false</property> <property name="DisplayDiscoveredDefinition" type="bool">false</property> <property name="DisplayDefinition" type="bool">false</property> <property name="DisplayRecommendedBy" type="bool">false</property> <property name="DisplayBestBetTitle" type="bool">false</property> <property name="DisplayDescription" type="bool">false</property> <property name="DisplayUrl" type="bool">false</property> </properties> </data> </webPart> </webParts>

<webParts> <webPart xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v3"> <metaData> <type name="Microsoft.Office.Server.Search.WebControls.CoreResultsWebPart,Microsoft.Office.Server.Search,Version=12.0.0.0,Culture=neutral,PublicKeyToken=71e9bce111e9429c" /> <importErrorMessage>Cannot import this Web Part.</importErrorMessage> </metaData> <data> <properties> <property name="Title" type="string">$Resources:spscore,CoreResultsWP_Title;</property> <property name="Description" type="string">$Resources:spscore,CoreResultsWP_Desc;</property> <property name="ChromeType">None</property> <property name="AllowMinimize" type="bool">true</property> <property name="AllowClose" type="bool">true</property> <property name="Hidden" type="bool">false</property> <property name="ShowActionLinks" type="bool">false</property> <property name="DateView" type="bool">false</property> <property name="RelevanceView" type="bool">false</property> <property name="DisplayAlertMeLink" type="bool">false</property> <property name="DisplayRSSLink" type="bool">false</property> <property name="DisplayDiscoveredDefinition" type="bool">true</property> <property name="ScopeID" type="int">1</property> </properties> </data> </webPart> </webParts>

<webParts> <webPart xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v3"> <metaData> <type name="Microsoft.Office.Server.Search.WebControls.HighConfidenceWebPart,Microsoft.Office.Server.Search,Version=12.0.0.0,Culture=neutral,PublicKeyToken=71e9bce111e9429c" /> <importErrorMessage>Cannot import this Web Part.</importErrorMessage> </metaData> <data> <properties> <property name="Title" type="string">$Resources:spscore,SearchBestBetsWP_Title;</property> <property name="Description" type="string">$Resources:spscore,SearchBestBetsWP_Desc;</property> <property name="ChromeType">None</property> <property name="AllowMinimize" type="bool">true</property> <property name="AllowClose" type="bool">true</property> <property name="Hidden" type="bool">false</property> <property name="PartOrder" type="int">1</property> <property name="DisplayHCImage" type="bool">false</property> <property name="DisplayHCTitle" type="bool">false</property> <property name="DisplayHCProps" type="bool">false</property> <property name="DisplayHCDescription" type="bool">false</property> </properties> </data> </webPart> </webParts>

<webParts>
  <webPart xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v3">
    <metaData>
      <type name="Microsoft.Office.Server.Search.WebControls.PeopleCoreResultsWebPart,Microsoft.Office.Server.Search,Version=12.0.0.0,Culture=neutral,PublicKeyToken=71e9bce111e9429c" />
      <importErrorMessage>Cannot import this Web Part.</importErrorMessage>
    </metaData>
    <data>
      <properties>
        <property name="Title" type="string">$Resources:spscore,SearchActionsWP_Title;</property>
        <property name="Description" type="string">$Resources:spscore,SearchActionsWP_Desc;</property>
        <property name="ChromeType">None</property>
        <property name="AllowMinimize" type="bool">true</property>
        <property name="AllowClose" type="bool">true</property> 
        <property name="Hidden" type="bool">false</property>
		<property name="ShowSearchResults" type="bool">false</property>
		<property name="ShowMessages" type="bool">false</property>
	<property name="Xsl" type="string"><xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" >
<xsl:param name="ResultsBy" />
<xsl:param name="ViewByLiteral" />
<xsl:param name="ViewByUrl" />
<xsl:param name="ViewByValue" />
<xsl:param name="IsNoKeyword" />
<xsl:param name="ShowActionLinks" />
<xsl:param name="AlertMeLink" />
<xsl:param name="AlertMeText" />
<xsl:param name="SrchRSSText" />
<xsl:param name="SrchRSSLink" />
<!-- When empty result set is returned from search -->
<xsl:template name="dvt_1.empty">
<div class="srch-sort-right">
<xsl:if test="$AlertMeLink and $ShowActionLinks">
<span class="srch-alertme" > <a href ="{$AlertMeLink}" id="CSR_AM1"><img style="vertical-align: middle;" src="/_layouts/images/bell.gif" border="0" alt=""/><xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes">&amp;nbsp;</xsl:text><xsl:value-of select="$AlertMeText" /></a>
</span>
</xsl:if>
<xsl:if test="$SrchRSSLink and $ShowActionLinks">
<xsl:if test="$AlertMeLink"> | </xsl:if>
<a type="application/rss+xml" href ="{$SrchRSSLink}" title="{$SrchRSSText}" id="SRCHRSSL"><img style="vertical-align: middle;" border="0" src="/_layouts/images/rss.gif" alt=""/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes">&amp;nbsp;</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="$SrchRSSText"/></a>
</xsl:if>
</div>
</xsl:template>
<!-- Main body template. Sets the Results view (Relevance or date) options -->
<xsl:template name="dvt_1.body">
<div>
<xsl:if test="$ShowActionLinks">
<div class="srch-sort-right">
<xsl:value-of select="$ResultsBy" />
<xsl:if test="$ViewByUrl"> | <a href ="{$ViewByUrl}" id="CSR_RV"><xsl:value-of select="$ViewByLiteral" /><xsl:value-of select="$ViewByValue" /></a>
</xsl:if>
<xsl:if test="$AlertMeLink"> |
<span class="srch-alertme" > <a href ="{$AlertMeLink}" id="CSR_AM2"><img style="vertical-align: middle;" src="/_layouts/images/bell.gif" border="0" alt=""/><xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes">&amp;nbsp;</xsl:text><xsl:value-of select="$AlertMeText" /></a>
</span>
</xsl:if>
<xsl:if test="$SrchRSSLink">| <a type="application/rss+xml" href ="{$SrchRSSLink}" title="{$SrchRSSText}" id="SRCHRSSL"><img style="vertical-align: middle;" border="0" src="/_layouts/images/rss.gif" alt=""/> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes">&amp;nbsp;</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="$SrchRSSText"/></a>
</xsl:if>
</div>
</xsl:if>
</div>
</xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="/">
<xsl:variable name="Rows" select="/All_Results/Result" />
<xsl:variable name="RowCount" select="count($Rows)" />
<xsl:variable name="IsEmpty" select="$RowCount = 0" />
<xsl:if test="$AlertMeLink"><input type="hidden" name="P_Query" /><input type="hidden" name="P_LastNotificationTime" />
</xsl:if>

<xsl:call-template name="dvt_1.body"/>

</xsl:template>
<!-- End of Stylesheet --></xsl:stylesheet>
	</property>
     </properties>
    </data>
  </webPart>
</webParts>

<webParts> <webPart xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v3"> <metaData> <type name="Microsoft.Office.Server.Search.WebControls.HighConfidenceWebPart,Microsoft.Office.Server.Search,Version=12.0.0.0,Culture=neutral,PublicKeyToken=71e9bce111e9429c" /> <importErrorMessage>Cannot import this Web Part.</importErrorMessage> </metaData> <data> <properties> <property name="Title" type="string">$Resources:spscore,HighConfidenceWP_Title;</property> <property name="Description" type="string">$Resources:spscore,HighConfidenceWP_Desc;</property> <property name="ChromeType">None</property> <property name="AllowMinimize" type="bool">true</property> <property name="AllowClose" type="bool">true</property> <property name="Hidden" type="bool">false</property> <property name="PartOrder" type="int">1</property> <property name="DisplayTerm" type="bool">false</property> <property name="DisplayImage" type="bool">false</property> <property name="DisplayDiscoveredDefinition" type="bool">false</property> <property name="DisplayDefinition" type="bool">false</property> <property name="DisplayRecommendedBy" type="bool">false</property> <property name="DisplayBestBetTitle" type="bool">false</property> <property name="DisplayDescription" type="bool">false</property> <property name="DisplayUrl" type="bool">false</property> </properties> </data> </webPart> </webParts>

<webParts>
					  <webPart xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v3">
					    <metaData>
					      <type name="Microsoft.Office.Server.Search.WebControls.PeopleCoreResultsWebPart,Microsoft.Office.Server.Search,Version=12.0.0.0,Culture=neutral,PublicKeyToken=71e9bce111e9429c" />
					      <importErrorMessage>Cannot import this Web Part.</importErrorMessage>
					    </metaData>
					    <data>
					      <properties>
						<property name="Title" type="string">$Resources:spscore,PeopleCoreResultsWP_Title;</property>
						<property name="Description" type="string">$Resources:spscore,PeopleCoreResultsWP_Desc;</property>
						<property name="ChromeType">None</property>
						<property name="AllowMinimize" type="bool">true</property>
						<property name="AllowClose" type="bool">true</property> 
						<property name="Hidden" type="bool">false</property>
						<property name="ScopeID" type="int">0</property>
						<property name="SelectColumns" type="string">
							<root xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
							    <Columns>
							        <Column Name="AccountName"/>
							        <Column Name="UserProfile_GUID"/>
							        <Column Name="PreferredName"/>
							        <Column Name="JobTitle"/>
							        <Column Name="Department"/>
							        <Column Name="WorkPhone"/>
							        <Column Name="OfficeNumber"/>
							        <Column Name="AboutMe"/>
							        <Column Name="PictureURL"/>
							        <Column Name="WorkEmail"/>
							        <Column Name="WebSite"/>
							        <Column Name="Path"/>
							        <Column Name="HitHighlightedSummary"/>
							        <Column Name="HitHighlightedProperties"/>
							        <Column Name="Responsibility"/>
							        <Column Name="Skills"/>
							        <Column Name="SipAddress"/>
							    </Columns>
							</root>
						</property>
						<property name="ShowActionLinks" type="bool">false</property>
					     </properties>
					    </data>
					  </webPart>
                                        </webParts>
